EmailTemplate.name: 201805_Global_Email_TFE731 Exchanges_Channel Partner Emails_JRD.201805_Global_Nu
EmailTemplate.subject: Buy a Certified TFE731 Engine from Honeywell in 3 Easy Steps
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Valued Channel Partner,
Honeywell’s TFE731 certified engine exchange program is here to help connect you and your customers with a certified pre-owned engine to get them back into their jet and onto their next destination as quickly as possible.
Buying an engine outright or exchanging your customer’s engine through our TFE731 certified engine exchange program is as easy as 1-2-3:
Step 1: Browse our certified, pre-owned inventory and choose the engine that’s right for your customer’s budget and aircraft. Step 2: Provide us with your contact information so that we can get in touch with you. Step 3: Talk to our GoDirect™ experts to complete your exchange or purchase.
And the best part? Honeywell channel partners can receive a discount on eligible TFE731 engines.
Browse our certified, pre-owned TFE731 inventory and choose the engine that’s right for your customer today.
VIEW ENGINE LISTINGS <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/services-and-support/godirect-services/certified-engine-exchanges]]>
